member.name: IDxcBlob.GetBufferPointer
member.summary: Retrieves a pointer to the blob's data.

member.name: IDxcBlob.GetBufferSize
member.summary: Retrieves the size (in bytes, and including the null-terminator) of the blob's data (the buffer).

member.name: IDxcBlob
member.summary: A sized buffer that can be passed into and out of DXC APIs. IDxcBlob is an alias of ID3D10Blob and ID3DBlob.
